item.title: About
item.description: We are DARKNAVY, an INDEPENDENT and FREE-SPIRITED security research team and service provider. We established AVSS ( Adversarial Vulnerability Scoring System) to evaluate vulnerabilities and the effectiveness of system mitigation mechanisms in real adversarial environments. During the past 20 years, we have been at the forefront of cybersecurity research and application, having won multiple world championships. We established the worldâ€™s unique and top-class security geek competition GEEKCON and responsibly disclosed over 1000 severe vulnerabilities.
